responsibilities.text: Implemented websites and landing pages from concept through deployment with JavaScript framework: ReactJS and CSS framework: TailwindCSS.
Standardized all output with a new, responsive, mobile-first approach and increased number of applicants by 50%.
Created the user experience that fetched, parsed, and formatted data, and relayed it into React components.
Built mock designs for landing pages and contact pages with Figma.
Organized a group of friends and colleagues; and founded an NGO that helped children with low economic resources to study during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Supervised and taught high-school students in the areas of Algebra, Physics and Math.
Arranged several career fairs with various high schools and encouraged students to follow STEM majors.
